name: Writer's Rush
description:
“Writer’s Rush ” is a writer’s simulator where you have to compete with other creators. Beat the rest and become the No.1 writer on the planet! There are 6 levels with different writers. After completing a level, you move on to the next one. Overcome Wally “Mad Dog” Shakespeare and win the competition before the time is up.

  • more than 300 unique stories with different endings
  • 24 players with their own biography and history
  • 6 unique levels
  • various playstyles
  • more than 20 typewriters
  • 69 book themes
  • 5 available genres
  • opportunity to interact with other writers
  • ability to respond to letters from fans and haters
  • flexible system of ratings and reviews
  • events, news and much more
